entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Counters & Logs for 404s and MapFallback #46404
  • Implement a mechanism for delivering updates from within the MVC view engine #46403
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Identify the code the compiler needs to generate when rendering a component from within a Razor Page/View #46402
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Bring back stateful prerendering #46401
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Data loading without needing a server API endpoint #46400
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Progressive enhancement of form submission & navigation #46399
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unified project system #46398
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Auto switching for interactive components #46397
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Security Review for Blazor United #46396
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We have a project template where we can add support for Server and Webassembly #46395
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We can interleave Static/Server/WebAssembly components within an app #46394
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We can perform basic CRUD operations on a completely SSR Razor Components app #46393
    .NET 8 Planning
  • allow stripping the icu data for blazor apps #46392
  • name claim does not seem to be full qualified #46388
  • DateOnly custom TypeConverter is ignored when using FromQuery #46384
  • ILogger.LogInformation write to console has miss some charactor #46382
  • Perf regression: mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #46378
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, plaintext #46377
  • Perf improvement: https, updates #46376
  • Perf improvement: https, mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter #46375
  • Perf improvement: json, json, mvc #46374
  • ViewEngine.GetView always fail #46363
  • Support emitting logs when binding fails in code generated endpoints #46362

Closed

  • ASPNETCORE_Environment overrides cmd parameter #17963
    8.0-preview2
  • Azure ASP.NET Core Logging Integration Site Extension 7.0.1 Causes 500.30 ANCM Startup Crash #45673
  • Why isn't the http logging middleware logging form data? #45161
    8.0-preview1
  • Adding Json aot/trimmer-safe overloads to [Typed]Results #46252
    8.0-preview2
  • Eliminate Trim/AOT Warnings related to System.Text.Json #45527
    8.0-preview2
  • SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter calls the serializer with unexpected Type #44852
    8.0-preview2
  • Missing JWT token with Safari (macOS and iOS) #45501
  • I have searched the existing issues #46390
  • Blazor - Items within the Virtualize component are not fully keyboard accessible #46385
  • Blazor JSInterop gives me a different value between Visual Studio and deployed site on Azure VM #46364
  • item position changed while scrolling in blazor virtualize with multiple items in row. #46383
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #46379
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #46381
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #46380
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mvc, stage1vanilla #46373
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter #46372
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, plaintext #46371
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #46370
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plaintext, updates #46369
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, multiple_queries, updates #46367
  • Perf improvement: caching, connectionclose, fortunes_dapper #46368
  • Minimal API experience in VS Code Dev Container / Codespaces #36678
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2102131 #46391
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71140c3` to `d925117` #46387
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71140c3` to `d925117` #46386
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Restrict named pipes transport to be Windows only #46366
    area-runtime
  • Don't close connection on MacOS when getting client certificate #46365
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update references to System.IO.Pipelines #46360
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
